Package logic

package logic
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActionHandler
    This class stores a variety of methods to process various actions in the program flow.
    Collision
    This class is used to check for collision between two different sprites.
    Coordinates
    This class is used to create the coordinates using x and y axis (x, y).
    Display
    This class is used to display the statistics of the farmer.
    Farmer
    This class emulates the player, its attributes, and responsibilities.
    MyFarm
    This class describes a the game world.
    NamePrompt
    This class is used to create the name prompt shown at the beginning of the game.
    PlotGrid
    This class creates a PlotGrid object.
    PlotLand
    This class describes a singular plot of land and has various attributes depending on what the plot is being used for.
    RegisterFarmer
    This class allows the user to register the farmer.
